description: This is an example configuration file. You can use this as a template for creating your own configuration file.

accessories.name: PUT THE NAME OF YOUR SWITCH HERE
accessories.url: PUT URL OF THE BROKER HERE
accessories.username: PUT USERNAME OF THE BROKER HERE
accessories.password: PUT PASSWORD OF THE BROKER HERE
accessories.caption: PUT THE LABEL OF YOUR SWITCH HERE

topics.statusGet: PUT THE MQTT TOPIC FOR THE GETTING THE STATUS OF YOUR SWITCH HERE
topics.statusSet: PUT THE MQTT TOPIC FOR THE SETTING THE STATUS OF YOUR SWITCH HERE

accessories.onValue: OPTIONALLY PUT THE VALUE THAT MEANS ON HERE (DEFAULT true)

accessories.integerValue: OPTIONALLY SET THIS TRUE TO USE 1/0 AS VALUES
